generic_title: Join our 1.6 million customers in a free, sustainable and trusted cloud.
generic_description: As Europeâ€™s leading cloud provider, we deliver public and private cloud products, shared hosting and dedicated server solutions in 140 countries worldwide.
details_title_corporation: We design, build and operate our own datacentres, servers and networks
details_description_corporation: For more than 20 years, OVHcloud has developed an integrated industrial business model that allows us to fully control our value chain for optimised operational efficiency.
details_title_individual: Data security with our trusted cloud
details_description_individual: With our secure and efficient datacentres and infrastructure, we use tiered processes to provide layers of protection for your data.
details_title_association: Trusted cloud solutions that ensure sovereignty and security for your data
details_description_association: Whether you are an individual or a public, private or government organisation, we guarantee the sovereignty of your data. As the first global player to strictly isolate its US activities, OVHcloud is also the first cloud provider to protect your data from extraterritorial laws by design.
